bibl.title: Ptolemaic to Roman Egypt: The Death of the Dirigiste State?
bibl.note: A re-appraisal of the Ptolemaic intervention in economic production.

bibl.title: Production and Public Powers in Classical Antiquity

bibl.seg: RATHBONE Dominic W., Ptolemaic to Roman Egypt: The Death of the Dirigiste State?
Elio LO CASCIO and Dominic W. RATHBONE (Edd.), Production and Public Powers in Classical Antiquity = Cambridge Philological Society. Suppl. 26 (Cambridge, 2000) pp. 44-54.
A re-appraisal of the Ptolemaic intervention in economic production.
